name: csv_by_rfc
description: CSV according to RFC 4180.  Everyone else's are weirdly wrong.  Heavily tested; typed in typescript

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f dist && rimraf -f docs && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir es6 && cd .. && mkdir docs
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run stoch
scripts.dist: mkdir dist && cp build/to_csv.* dist && cp build/from_csv.* dist && cp build/index.* dist
scripts.doc: typedoc --out docs/docs/ src/ts/index.ts && cp src/misc/.nojekyll docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run typescript && npm run doc && npm run dist

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
